Posts.Content: Jan 7, 2012 11:42PM Jcole wrote: I have been up reading the various discussions on this site and you women are so brave and giving for sharing your experience. I had a mammogram yesterday and they found 3 different clusters of calification (2 in the left and 1 in the right). I can't have a biopsies for 2 weeks but hopefully on Monday I will be able to schedule with another hospital!! I'm staying positive but at the same time I want to be well informed. Thank you all for sharing. God bless!!
Posts.Title: How did you hear biopsy results--phone or appt? frazzledmom schoolmom
